featured.text: About 200 million years ago this super-continent broke up into two continents: Laurasia and Gondwana.

definition.zh_def: 古生代至中生代期間存在的超大陸，包含現今的南美洲、非洲、南極洲、澳大利亞和印度等地。
definition.en_def: A supercontinent that existed from the Late Precambrian to the Jurassic period, comprising present-day South America, Africa, Antarctica, Australia, and India.
definition.example: Gondwana was once a massive landmass that eventually split into several continents.
